_sText:
For around 10 months ago, i released my first project bhop_dreamtour. The purpose was to make a hard auto map, and also the longest bhop map ever made. As long as i created the levels, i didn't know very much about compiling and optimizing a level, which caused i had to cut the map into 2 maps, and release bhop_dreamtour2 in a couple of time afterwards.

Now i have remade some parts in the map, and added some more detail to it, but a lot of the map was builded 10 month ago, so i had to make the environment roughly based on the rooms/creations.

I have remade this map to be PLAYED ON LEGIT! since it will be too linear with the autobhop gameplay it had, as the very first time.

It has different non in-real-life themes as bhop_dreamtour has. and the difficulty is pretty hard overall. It starts a little easier and gets harder through the levels and stages. Some stages is a bit long.

It can be played on normal scroll/legit settings with 100 tickrate, sv_airaccelerate 100, sv_gravity 800, fps_max 300 and no scout/260 ground speed, but also good gameplay for autobhop settings 100 tickrate.

Thanks for George and Dream for testing the levels. have fun.
